summary: Aplicativo Android simples para entregadores: escanear pedidos via câmera com OCR, extrair nome do cliente e rua, armazenar temporariamente, organizar por rua e agrupar clientes com múltiplos pedidos, com interface rápida e clara para uso em entregas.
architectural_notes: Entrada de dados via câmera com OCR para captura de pedidos.
Pedidos devem ser armazenados temporariamente no dispositivo (armazenamento local).

existing_features.title: Implement a mobile-first UI that lets a courier add one order at a time by capturing an image from the device camera or uploading a photo, optimized for fast scanning and review.

Perform on-device OCR on the captured/uploaded image and extract (a) customer name and (b) street name into structured fields, with the ability for the user to quickly edit/confirm the extracted values before saving.
Store scanned orders temporarily in the app and allow clearing all stored orders; persistence should survive a page refresh during the delivery shift without requiring sign-in.
Provide an orders overview that organizes orders by street and allows the courier to expand/collapse each street group to see the orders within it.
Within each street group, aggregate customers who have more than one order and display the quantity next to the customer name, while still allowing access to the underlying individual orders.
Add quick actions for managing the temporary list: delete an individual order, and optionally mark an order as completed/delivered to reduce active clutter during the route.

Create and apply a coherent visual theme for the entire app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) that prioritizes readability outdoors and rapid interaction; avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors.

new_feature_requests.summary: Escanear pedidos individualmente usando a câmera com OCR
Extrair automaticamente nome do cliente e nome da rua a partir do OCR
Armazenar pedidos escaneados temporariamente no app
Agrupar clientes com mais de um pedido e exibir a quantidade
Interface simples e rápida, focada em clareza para entregas

projectName: Courier order scanner web app with on-device OCR and street-based organization
